name: Keyboard Warrior (itch) (connorallenkilpatrick, Arjun Jaishankar, Madison H, Carsen Decker)
name_original: Keyboard Warrior (itch) (connorallenkilpatrick, Arjun Jaishankar, Madison H, Carsen Decker)
description:
Use the keyboard to move!

Attack enemies by pressing the key they're standing on!

If you don't move at first, you're being blocked by an enemy. Fight it or pick an adjacent key to move to!

You can destroy the Wizard's keycaps!

Survive as long as you can!

Conquer the keyboard and then the leaderboard!

Score is tracked in waves survived and coins collected—special gold coins that only drop if you're at full health!

Can you claim the top leaderboard spot?

The built-in leaderboard doesn't display scores, but it's still properly ranked by initials!

Enemies like to run in place (for exercise, probably).

Enemies can sometimes phase through the player, so don't be alarmed.

Check the screenshots sidebar to the right!

Connor

Concept, Game Design, 3D Modeling, Animation, Sound Effects, Additional 2D Art, Additional VFX

Carsen

Game Design, Programming, VFX

Arjun

Programming, Additional Game Design

Madison

Music and additional sound effects by JuanArangoMusic.
